zh_CN: 我又不自觉地回想起了过去，天呐，饶了我吧！许多人人在成长至下一阶段后，会无法接纳过去的自己。
en: I unconsciously start thinking about the past again. Oh my god, please spare me! Many people, when they grow into the next stage of their lives, are unable to accept their past selves.

zh_CN: 当我意识到我正在回忆，并且对此感到抵制时，大脑反而会叛逆地将这些不断的涌现出来。
en: When I realize I'm reminiscing and start resisting it, my mind rebelliously brings these thoughts up again and again.
